content.text: Match ends, Atlético de Madrid 1, Barcelona 1.
Second Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 1, Barcelona 1.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Antoine Griezmann (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Antoine Griezmann (Atlético de Madrid).
Saúl Ñíguez (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card.
Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Saúl Ñíguez (Atlético de Madrid).
André Gomes (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Thomas Partey (Atlético de Madrid).
Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid).
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Fernando Torres replaces Gabi.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 1, Barcelona 1. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) header from very close range to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Sergi Roberto with a cross.
Attempt saved. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Gerard Deulofeu.
Substitution, Barcelona. Paulinho replaces Ivan Rakitic.
Attempt saved. Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by André Gomes.
Jordi Alba (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid).
Foul by Thomas Partey (Atlético de Madrid).
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Thomas Partey replaces Yannick Carrasco.
Attempt missed. André Gomes (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Gerard Piqué.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) hits the left post with a left footed shot from the centre of the box.
Koke (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by André Gomes (Barcelona).
Foul by Jordi Alba (Barcelona).
Koke (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Luis Suárez.
Foul by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Yannick Carrasco (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Atlético de Madrid. Koke tries a through ball, but Nicolás Gaitán is caught offside.
Koke (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Jordi Alba (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Roberto replaces Nélson Semedo.
Substitution, Barcelona. Gerard Deulofeu replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Diego Godín (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by André Gomes (Barcelona).
Substitution, Atlético de Madrid. Nicolás Gaitán replaces Ángel Correa.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) hits the right post with a left footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Gabi (Atlético de Madrid).
Attempt saved. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Attempt missed. Antoine Griezmann (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses the top left corner. Assisted by Koke.
Attempt saved. Yannick Carrasco (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Koke.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Samuel Umtiti.
Yannick Carrasco (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Nélson Semedo (Barcelona).
Second Half begins Atlético de Madrid 1, Barcelona 0.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
First Half ends, Atlético de Madrid 1, Barcelona 0.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked.
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gabi (Atlético de Madrid).
Offside, Barcelona. Sergio Busquets tries a through ball, but Jordi Alba is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is blocked. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Foul by Ángel Correa (Atlético de Madrid).
Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Foul by Luis Suárez (Barcelona).
Juanfran (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card.
Offside, Barcelona. Ivan Rakitic tries a through ball, but André Gomes is caught offside.

Foul by Saúl Ñíguez (Atlético de Madrid).
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Filipe Luis (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by André Gomes (Barcelona).
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 1, Barcelona 0. Saúl Ñíguez (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Yannick Carrasco.
Foul by Samuel Umtiti (Barcelona).
Ángel Correa (Atlético de Madrid) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Gabi (Atlético de Madrid) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Gabi (Atlético de Madrid).
Attempt saved. Antoine Griezmann (Atlético de Madrid) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Gabi with a headed pass.
Corner,  Atlético de Madrid. Conceded by Marc-André ter Stegen.
Attempt saved. Antoine Griezmann (Atlético de Madrid) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ángel Correa.
Offside, Atlético de Madrid. Ángel Correa tries a through ball, but Antoine Griezmann is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Saúl Ñíguez.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
